name: v2.0.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix typo by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/1
* support for installing grafana plugins into the docker image by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/2
* support custom env vars in the docker image by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/3
* Bazel 0.24.1 compatibility by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/4
* support overriding the default version of grafanalib by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/5
* Update rules docker by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/6
* grafanalib & grafana upgrade by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/7
* move rules_grafana to python3 by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/8
* Add syntax highlighting to the readme file by @arturdryomov in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/9
* Use custom grafana container by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/11
* you can't safely disable python2 after all by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/12
* grafana 7 & bazel 3.2 by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/13
* upgrade bazel & libraries by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/14
* ensure all provisioned dashboard files are newer than timestamp 0 by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/15
* Upgrade grafanalib by @cristi- in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/16
* upgrade to grafana 7.4.3 by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/17
* Update grafana to 8.2.1 by @htplbc in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/18
* Upgrade grafana to 8.2.2 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/19
* Upgrade grafanalib by @rbarrita in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/20
* update grafanalib by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/21
* IRPSRE-5846: Bump to 8.5.5 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/22
* IRPSRE-6056: Grafana: 8.5.5 -> 9.1.1 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/23
* update rules_python by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/24
* fix tests by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/25
* update cfg in actions by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/26
* grafana 9.1.1 -> 9.5.3 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/29
* update grafana by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/30
* Migrate grafana_image to rules_oci by @mrmeku in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/32
* Disallow dashboards with the same file name by @mrmeku in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/33
* MLSRE-7560-Grafana-10.4-upgrade by @qglover in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/34
* update grafanalib and bazel by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/36
* remove strip_prefix arg by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/37
* update grafana module to bazelmod by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/38
* Require Bazel 8+ by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/39

## New Contributors
* @greggdonovan made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/1
* @kevingessner made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/2
* @cristifalcas made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/6
* @arturdryomov made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/9
* @cristi- made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/16
* @htplbc made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/18
* @oremj made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/19
* @rbarrita made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/20
* @mrmeku made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/32
* @qglover made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/34

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/commits/v2.0.0

## What's Changed
* Fix typo by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/1
* support for installing grafana plugins into the docker image by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/2
* support custom env vars in the docker image by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/3
* Bazel 0.24.1 compatibility by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/4
* support overriding the default version of grafanalib by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/5
* Update rules docker by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/6
* grafanalib & grafana upgrade by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/7
* move rules_grafana to python3 by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/8
* Add syntax highlighting to the readme file by @arturdryomov in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/9
* Use custom grafana container by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/11
* you can't safely disable python2 after all by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/12
* grafana 7 & bazel 3.2 by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/13
* upgrade bazel & libraries by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/14
* ensure all provisioned dashboard files are newer than timestamp 0 by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/15
* Upgrade grafanalib by @cristi- in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/16
* upgrade to grafana 7.4.3 by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/17
* Update grafana to 8.2.1 by @htplbc in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/18
* Upgrade grafana to 8.2.2 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/19
* Upgrade grafanalib by @rbarrita in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/20
* update grafanalib by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/21
* IRPSRE-5846: Bump to 8.5.5 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/22
* IRPSRE-6056: Grafana: 8.5.5 -> 9.1.1 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/23
* update rules_python by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/24
* fix tests by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/25
* update cfg in actions by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/26
* grafana 9.1.1 -> 9.5.3 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/29
* update grafana by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/30
* Migrate grafana_image to rules_oci by @mrmeku in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/32
* Disallow dashboards with the same file name by @mrmeku in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/33
* MLSRE-7560-Grafana-10.4-upgrade by @qglover in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/34
* update grafanalib and bazel by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/36
* remove strip_prefix arg by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/37
* update grafana module to bazelmod by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/38
* Require Bazel 8+ by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/39

## New Contributors
* @greggdonovan made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/1
* @kevingessner made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/2
* @cristifalcas made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/6
* @arturdryomov made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/9
* @cristi- made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/16
* @htplbc made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/18
* @oremj made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/19
* @rbarrita made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/20
* @mrmeku made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/32
* @qglover made their first contribution in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/34

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/commits/v2.0.0

## What's Changed
* Fix typo by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/1
* support for installing grafana plugins into the docker image by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/2
* support custom env vars in the docker image by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/3
* Bazel 0.24.1 compatibility by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/4

* grafanalib & grafana upgrade by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/7
* move rules_grafana to python3 by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/8

* upgrade to grafana 7.4.3 by @kevingessner in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/17
* Update grafana to 8.2.1 by @htplbc in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/18
* Upgrade grafana to 8.2.2 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/19
* Upgrade grafanalib by @rbarrita in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/20

* grafana 9.1.1 -> 9.5.3 by @oremj in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/29
* update grafana by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/30
* Migrate grafana_image to rules_oci by @mrmeku in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/32
* Disallow dashboards with the same file name by @mrmeku in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/33
* MLSRE-7560-Grafana-10.4-upgrade by @qglover in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/34
* update grafanalib and bazel by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/36
* remove strip_prefix arg by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/37
* update grafana module to bazelmod by @cristifalcas in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/38
* Require Bazel 8+ by @greggdonovan in https://github.com/etsy/rules_grafana/pull/39
